person.name: Won Yong Ko
person.description: Elder Won Yong Ko was called to serve as a member of the Second Quorum of the Seventy of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints on April 2, 2005, at age 59. He was called as an Area Authority in August 1995. In April 1997, he was called as a member of the Third Quorum of the Seventy and an Area Authority Seventy in the Asia North Area.
